column1: 昨天晚上 (zuó tiān wǎn shàng)@yesterday evening#
(xué yuàn lù ne?)@How about College Road?#
(wǒ yào xiàn zài chī wǔ fàn.)@I’m going to have lunch now.#
(liù jiā liù shì duō shǎo?)@Six plus six is how much?#
(tā bú shì hěn dà.)@She is not very big.#
(xiàn zài jǐ diǎn zhōng?)@What time is it? (lit. “Now at what time?”)#
(nǐ jiā lǐ yǒu jǐ gè rén?)@How many people are there in your family?#
(nǐ men qù le ma?)@Did you (pl) go?#
(wǒ xiǎng kàn tā.)@I would like to see him.#
(shì bú shì zài nàr?)@Is it located over there?#
(bú shì xiǎo nǚ ér.)@It isn’t the younger daughter.#
(wǒ men kě yǐ yì qǐ zǒu.)@We can leave together.#
(nǐ hǎo ma?)@How are you? (“Are you well?”)#
(wǒ shuō de bù hǎo.)@I don’t speak well.#
(nǐ shuō shén me?)@What did you say? (lit. “You speak what?”)#
(wǒ bù xiǎng zǒu.)@I would not like to leave.#
(shén me yì si?)@What does that mean? (“What meaning?”)#
(nǐ yǒu méi yǒu ... ?)@Do you have ... ? (lit. “you have / don’t have?” ...)#
(jiǔ diǎn zhōng bù hǎo.)@Nine o’clock is not okay.#
(wǒ bù xiǎng zài zhèr hē.)@I would not like to drink here.#
(yì bǎi liù shí wǔ)@one hundred sixty-five#
(nǐ men shén me shí hòu qù le?)@When did you go?#
(chá shì gěi nǐ de.)@The tea is for you.#
(wǒ bù míng bai shén me?)@What don’t I understand?#
(xiǎo nǚ ér ne?)@What about the younger daughter?#
(shí èr kuài rén mín bì)@twelve renminbi#
(nǐ xiǎng qù nǎr chī?)@Where would you like to go to eat?#
(tài yí hàn le!)@That’s really too bad!#
(xiàn zài bù hǎo.)@Not now. (lit. “Now not OK.”)#
(tiān tán)@Heavenly Altar / Temple of Heaven (Beijing historical site)#
(shì gěi nǐ de.)@It is for you.#
(wǒ xiǎng wǒ yào kàn tā.)@I think I’m going to see him.#
(tā men hěn dà le.)@They are very grown up.#
(wǒ zhēn de bù zhī dào.)@I really don’t know.#
(qǐng zài shuō yí cì.)@Please say it again.#
(wǒ xǐ huān pí jiǔ.)@I like beer.#
(liǎng bēi pí jiǔ)@two beers (lit. “two glasses of beer”)#
(nǐ shuō de hěn kuài!)@You speak very quickly!#
(nǐ shuō de tài kuài le.)@You speak too quickly.#
(má fán nǐ ...)@Please ... (as in “Sorry to be bothering you ... ”)#
(nǐ mǎi le shén me?)@What did you buy?#
(shì bā diǎn zhōng ma?)@Is it at eight o’clock?#
(wǒ men méi yǒu shí jiān.)@We don’t have the time.#
(nǐ men yào zuò fēi jī qù ma?)@Are you going to take a plane?#
(liǎng qiān sān bǎi kuài rén mín bì)@two thousand three hundred renminbi#
(liǎng qiān sì bǎi)@two thousand four hundred#
(nǐ bù míng bai shén me?)@What don’t you understand?#
(yí gè xīng qī le.)@for one week / It has been one week.#
(wǒ men shì yì qǐ dào de.)@We arrived together.#
(nà tiáo shì yīng huáng dào.)@That is King’s Road.#
(bú shì zài nàr.)@It is not located over there.#
(yì si shì ...)@It means ... / The meaning is ...#
(wǒ men yǒu liǎng gè ér zi.)@We have two sons.#
(wǒ yào zǒu le.)@I’m going to leave.#
(wǒ qián bú gòu.)@I don’t have enough money.#
(tā zài měi guó.)@He is in America.#
(duō jiǔ le?)@For how long? (“It has been how long?”)#
(wǒ bù kě yǐ gěi nǐ.)@I can’t give any to you.#
(tài duō qián le.)@It’s too much money.#
(yì bǎi sì shí qī)@one hundred forty-seven#
